name: Orzam
description:
RPG Game

  • Turn base battle CTB (like Final Fantasy 10)
  • 5 playable character
  • Challenging boss battle
  • Unique skills and items for every character
  • Fully animated characters and enemies
  • + 5 hours for the main story
  • 5-10 hours for post-game
  • Skills learn/ system
  • Attribute points
  • Different quality of weapons and armors (Normal to Legendary)
  • In game Guide for post-game (Boss, Quest, Item)
  • Map Compass

Please feel free to contact me for any improvement or suggestion.

*The final part of the main story will be added soon. The post-game content remains accessible.* *items, skills, menu and quest description are in English. Story is in French.*
